member.name: T:StockFlowPro.Domain.Enums.SubscriptionStatus
member.summary: Defines the possible statuses for a subscription.

member.name: F:StockFlowPro.Domain.Enums.SubscriptionStatus.Active
member.summary: Subscription is active and in good standing.

member.name: F:StockFlowPro.Domain.Enums.SubscriptionStatus.Suspended
member.summary: Subscription is temporarily suspended (e.g., payment failed but within grace period).

member.name: F:StockFlowPro.Domain.Enums.SubscriptionStatus.Cancelled
member.summary: Subscription has been cancelled but may still be active until the end of the billing period.

member.name: F:StockFlowPro.Domain.Enums.SubscriptionStatus.Expired
member.summary: Subscription has expired and is no longer active.

member.name: F:StockFlowPro.Domain.Enums.SubscriptionStatus.Trial
member.summary: Subscription is in trial period.

member.name: F:StockFlowPro.Domain.Enums.SubscriptionStatus.PastDue
member.summary: Subscription is past due (payment failed and outside grace period).

member.name: F:StockFlowPro.Domain.Enums.SubscriptionStatus.Pending
member.summary: Subscription is pending activation (e.g., waiting for payment confirmation).
